text.section:
Annually, the Division shall submit a complete financial and operational report of Maryland Correctional Enterprises and the Maryland Correctional Enterprises revolving fund to:
the Governor;
the Secretary; and
the Secretary of Budget and Management.

The report required under subsection (a) of this section shall:
be in the same general form as a report by the Division on its operations and programs; and
include information about present and projected personnel and compensation requirements of Maryland Correctional Enterprises.
The Governor, the Secretary, and the Secretary of Budget and Management may include data from the report submitted under this section in the preparation of the budget and capital improvement bill.
